articles.content:
Ukrainian preparatory committee formed 
    Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The central committee of the Communist Party of Ukraine and the Ukraine-DPRK Association inaugurated the Ukrainian preparatory committee for commemorating the day of the sun and celebrating February 16 the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, on Jan. 22 and made public an action program for the February holiday.
 The program deals with the issues of establishing the DPRK week and holding colorful functions including commeration meeting, book and photo exhibition, lecture, art performance and roundtable discussion.

articles.content:
National ice skating contest of school youth and children 
    Samjiyon, January 25 (KCNA) -- A national ice skating contest of school youth and children took place at Lake Samji in Ryanggang Province from Jan. 21 to 25 to mark the anniversary of the foundation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
 Participants from senior middle and primary schools competed in 5,000 metre, 3,000 metre, 1,500 metre and 500 metre speed skating competitions.    
 At the closing ceremony trophy cups and medals were awarded to schools and skaters who distinguished themselves in the contest.
